About Us

BENtOn CrossFit is forging elite fitness in the Southern Highlands. We offer group classes 6 days a week as well as intensive personal training sessions available. With coaches dedicated to encouraging optimal technique and a focus on high intensity training, BENt On CrossFit is not your average gym.

No workout is the same, with people of mixed gender and ability levels all working to their own capacity, with movements tailored to individual needs.

BENt On CrossFit is also a stockist of an extensive range of supplements from Australian Sports Nutrition. With knowledgable coaches and a great deal of choice, you should be sure to find your supplementation needs. Otherwise, we can order it in!

Excellent Facilities

Our box has state of the art equipment that helps you to feel safe and secure when working out.

Tailored Programming

Every workout is scaled to meet your abilities, always pushing you forward.

Helpful Trainers

Our trainers are here to help you learn the correct techniques and increase your functional fitness.

Great Community

Make new friends in your local area. Crossfit565 is more then a gym, it's a community.

Our Facility

We have a brand new facility that caters for classes and one on one training. We have a 650m2 of CrossFit floor space. 2Om purpose built rig, dedicated olympic lifting area, 20m x 4m of astroturf. You will find Kettlebells, Dumbbells, Wallballs, Rowers and endless amounts of Conditioning equipment.

Use Wufoo integrations and get your data to your favorite apps.

Meet Our Team

Ben Garard

Head Coach

Ben is part of the upper echelon of the Crossfit world. He is a regional competitor and is one of the few Australian atheletes to be part of the new National Pro Grid League competition. This American based competition allows Ben to compete side by side with the worlds best. And it also gives him an opportunity to learn coaching techniques from top Crossfit coaches all around the world.

Other achievements include:

  • Winner - Fitbloke Challenge
  • Runner up - OC Throwdown
  • 11th at Crossfit Games Australia Regional 2014
  • Part of San Fran Fire NPGL Team

Ricky Garard
